errors.adminOnlyCommand: ${author.tag} tried to run admin only command '${command.name}'
errors.disallowedGuildId: ${author.tag} tried to run command '${command.name}' in a guild '${guild.name}' which the command is not configured to be run in
errors.disallowedChannel: ${author.tag} tried to run command '${command.name}' in a channel '#${channel.name}' which the command is not configured to be run in
errors.authorMissingRequiredRole: ${author.tag} does not have required roles to run command '${command.name}'
